clearview.midnightconfig.title: Clear View
clearview.midnightconfig.FogStart.toolti: Fog start sets distance; a larger gap to fog end smooths the fog gradient.
clearview.midnightconfig.FogEnd.tooltip: Fog End sets furthest distance; a larger gap to fog start smooths the fog gradient.
clearview.midnightconfig.PortalOverlayDi: If yes means that there wont be an nether portal overlay.
